gemini_config.system_instruction: A vintage architectural infographic of  that blends art and technical clarity: a detailed front elevation at the center, a clean line-art landscape of  behind it, and annotated dimension lines with sample values like “” and “”. Surrounded by 2–3 close-up detail boxes and a “Site plan – ” panel, the piece uses pen-and-ink hatching on warm aged paper to feel like a hand-drawn architectural study sheet.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""A vintage architectural infographic of  that blends art and technical clarity: a detailed front elev..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
